categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Clone Wars

nodes.text: The shatterax was a creature in the galaxy, one of which was used in a gladiator pit.

According to Star Wars Insider 149, the shatterax monster was set to appear in the comic series Star Wars: Darth Maul—Son of Dathomir. However, the scene did not appear in the final comic. The Insider article, written by Daniel Wallace, was based on rough story notes that he had received for the comic.
